name: com.unity.xiaomi
description: Unity SDK for Xiaomi integrates Xiaomi store to Unity IAP, which includes Amazon, Google Play, etc. The stand-alone Xiaomi SDK isn't integrated to Unity IAP and just include Xiaomi Store SDK. If developers only need to publish their games to Xiaomi Store, this SDK will suffice.
